oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Colonel Tom Parker presented with an honorary plaque by Mayor Ben West, 1960 November 16
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured left to right: Colonel Thomas Andrew “Tom” Parker accepting an official plaque from Nashville Mayor Ben West, November 16th, 1960: “Col. Thomas A. Parker is hereby appointed Honorary Chief of Police of Nashville in grateful appreciation for his outstanding civic and public service. Ben West, Mayor.” Parker, born Andreas Cornelis “Dries” van Kuijk, was a Dutch-born entertainment impresario known best as the manager of Elvis Presley. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West, Ben, 1911-1974; Parker, Tom, 1909 June 26-1997
